remediation: Upgrade tribe29/checkmk to version 2.2.0p17 or higher.
title: Uncontrolled Search Path Element

vulnDescription.Overview: Affected versions of this package are vulnerable to Uncontrolled Search Path Element due to the improper handling of the LD_LIBRARY_PATH environment variable. An attacker can escalate privileges by injecting malicious libraries into the search path used by the dynamic linker.
